subject: Video buffering
description: I am watching anime for the past year in Crunchyroll and there is always buffering while I try to watch on full-HD I have used other websites like Netflix and AnimeLab and there is no buffering issue so I would like You to fix it this issue.

assignee.name: Alla C
assignee.signature:
Stay safe and healthy!

Best regards,

Aya
Customer Service Agent

comments.body:
Hi G7prashant123, 

Thanks for getting in touch with us and we sincerely apologize for any inconveniences and for the delayed reply. Looks like your ticket got into the wrong queue! Is the problem still happening? If so, please let us know and we'll be right here to help you out!

Stay safe and healthy!

Best regards,

Aya
Customer Service Agent

subject: Crunchyroll data erasure request - from Sameer B S - request: PZYOKAEQ
raw_subject: Crunchyroll data erasure request - from Sameer B S - request: PZYOKAEQ
description:
Hello Crunchyroll (crunchyroll.com),

My name is Sameer B S, and I hereby request to erase all personal data that you hold about me.

Please send me an email confirmation of the complete and permanent erasure of the personal data once you have completed the erasure process.

My personal details are:

* Name: Sameer B S
* Email: samirkashyap432@gmail.com


As evidence of my interaction with your company, I received an email on 2021 April 16 that indicates that you are holding personal data about me.

Thanks,
Sameer B S

Request: PZYOKAEQ

comments.body:
Hi there,

Thanks so much for emailing in. The security of your data is important to us!     We have reached out to our internal operations to have your data removed in its entirety.

Your request     has been placed into the queue--We will notify you just as soon as it has been processed. Thank you for     your continued patience!

**We apologize if this message was sent twice. We are modifying our process,     please bear with us.**

###### Ixioph
###### Customer Service Knowledge Engineer
comments.html_body:
Hi there,

Thanks so much for emailing in. The security of your data is important to us! We have reached out to our internal operations to have your data removed in its entirety.

Your request has been placed into the queue--We will notify you just as soon as it has been processed. Thank you for your continued patience!

We apologize if this message was sent twice. We are modifying our process, please bear with us.

Ixioph
